posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of Lower Grade T206 Commons - Priced Individually **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following lot of T206 commons.  All are lower grade as shown in the scans.  Payment via any method you prefer.  Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve any cards.  Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards for easier reading):

Durham (Sovereign, trimmed on top but otherwise beautiful) - $25
Nattress (huge borders!) - $18
McIntyre (SGC 10) - $16
Bump for a price drop on remaining cards.  Thanks!
